motor

public void motor(int motor,
                  int percent)
Description copied from class: Motor
Set motor speed. It's recommended you use a Back-EMF based function instead.

Overrides:
motor in class Motor
Parameters:
motor - Motor number to change percent of (0-3)
percent - percent % of full (-100 to 100)
See Also:
Motor.fd(int), Motor.bk(int), Motor.mav(int, int)
